key_terms: The Manufacturer appoints the Customer as the sole and exclusive agent for the promotion, sales, marketing distribution and administration of the Products.
The agreement is for a term of ten (10) years.
The agreement will be automatically renewed at the end of every ten (10) year term.
A six (6) months notice must be given by either party to terminate the agreement.
The Manufacturer agrees to supply documentation and information relating to the Products.
The Customer agrees to pay freight, insurance and any associated expenses for shipping.
The Manufacturer guarantees that the Products are packaged to prevent foreseeable damage during shipment.
The Customer shall inspect all Products promptly upon receipt and may reject defective Products.
Payment terms require 50% payment on order placement and 50% before goods leave the warehouse.
The Manufacturer must maintain product liability insurance throughout the term of the agreement.
